name: Falling Tower (Simpathey)
description:
The Falling Tower:

A perfect score is 4 blocks on floor (because you start with a 4 block base) and 20 seconds durability! 

You are part of a wizard construction team! Building a magic tower should be easy right?

WRONG

The magic that holds stones together is failing. At least you have arcane magic threads that can try and hold your unstable tower together.
